markdown:
<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">
[Evil Eye](/Spells.aspx?ID=1889)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Curse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=38" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 386 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Patron Theme**
[The Resentment](/Patrons.aspx?ID=14)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Will

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your patron's resentment manifests in a baleful, envious gaze. The target becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) if it fails a Will save (or sickened 2 on a critical failure). This condition value can't be reduced below 1 while the spell is active and you can see the target.
name: Evil Eye

text: Evil Eye Single Action Source Player Core pg. 386 2.0 Patron Theme The Resentment Range 30 feet Target 1 creature Defense Will Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- Your patron's resentment manifests in a baleful, envious gaze. The target becomes sickened 1 if it fails a Will save (or sickened 2 on a critical failure). This condition value can't be reduced below 1 while the spell is active and you can see the target.
